attributes.action: Hold a public awareness campaign to raise awareness of early menopause
attributes.additional_details: An early menopause can have a devastating impact on a women's life and her fertility. The symptoms associated with early menopause can lead to challenges which can go unrecognised in a younger population. The physical and mental impact of this can effect relationships and an individual's self-worth. Fertility struggles can compound this even further. There is a lot of stigma surrounding these issues, by raising awareness we can educate people, break down stigma and encourage support for these women.
attributes.background: We want the Government to hold a public awareness campaign to raise awareness of Early Menopause and the causes such as surgery, cancer treatments and certain health conditions. Early menopause can have a devastating impact on a women's physical and mental health.
